original_text: And over the company of the tribe of the people of Asher was Pagiel the son of Ochran.
korean_text: 아셀 자손 지파의 군대는 오그란의 아들 바기엘이 이끌었고

sentences.original_text: over the company of the tribe of the people of Asher
sentences.korean_translation: 아셀 지파 백성의 부대를 다스린 자는

sentences.original_text: was Pagiel the son of Ochran.
